subject: Logos
Advertising and Marketing
Uniforms
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The recent presentation to the N.B.A.’s board of governors suggested that the league might become the first of the four established leagues in the United States to allow its players to wear advertising.
snippet: The recent presentation to the N.B.A.’s board of governors suggested that the league might become the first of the four established leagues in the United States to allow its players to wear advertising.
